message.content:
cs.DC, cs.LO, cs.GT, cs.SY, cs.AI. 

The paper deals with the problem of controlling a distributed system, which falls under the category of Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing (cs.DC). The use of Zielonka asynchronous automata suggests a focus on formal methods and logic (cs.LO). The concept of games and objectives indicates a connection to game theory (cs.GT). The mention of communication with the environment suggests a systems and control perspective (cs.SY). Finally, the use of algorithms to solve the control problem suggests a connection to artificial intelligence (cs.AI).
